content.heading: Introduction
content.body: PropYouLike is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website or services.

content.heading: Data We Collect
content.body: We collect personal information such as name, phone number, and email address when users submit inquiry forms, request site visits, or interact with our lead generation tools.

content.heading: How We Use Your Data
content.body: Your information is used to contact you regarding your property inquiries, site visit scheduling, pricing details, and related real estate assistance. Your details may be shared with verified developer sales teams strictly for fulfilling your request.

content.heading: WhatsApp and Phone Communication
content.body: By submitting your contact details on PropYouLike, you consent to receiving calls, WhatsApp messages, or SMS from our team regarding your property inquiry, site visit coordination, and related real estate assistance. Communication may also involve verified developer sales representatives where required. We do not request sensitive information such as passwords, OTPs, banking details, or card information.

content.heading: Third-Party Tools
content.body: We use third-party tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Facebook Pixel, LinkedIn Insight Tag, Microsoft Clarity, Hotjar, and Privyr to improve website performance, analyze traffic, and manage lead communication.

content.heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content.body: PropYouLike uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to understand user behavior, measure marketing effectiveness, and improve user experience. These tools may collect anonymized usage data. Users can manage or disable cookies through their browser settings.

content.heading: Your Rights
content.body: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. You may also opt out of marketing communications at any time by contacting us through the details provided below.

content.heading: Business Role Clarification
content.body: PropYouLike is a real estate marketing and channel partner platform. We are not the developer, promoter, or owner of the projects listed on our website. All project names, trademarks, images, and details belong to their respective developers.

content.heading: Contact Information
content.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how your data is handled, you may contact us at: Email: hi@propyoulike.com | Phone: +91 93798 22010 | Address: PropYouLike, Nandi Enclave, Banashankari 3rd Stage, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.
